release.description: This release of the Model DM-Document is a component of the integrated release 10.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: The conversion of output modules that write and convert the model to files in specific formats is still on-going. Bug fixes and enhancements are detailed in model-ontology section.

release.action: The conversion of output modules that write and convert the model to files in specific formats is still on-going. Bug fixes and enhancements are detailed in model-ontology section.

release.description: This release of the Model DM-Document is a component of the integrated release 9.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: The conversion of ouput modules that write and convert the model to files in specific formats is still on-going. Bug fixes and enhancements are detailed in model-ontology section.

release.description: This release of the Model DM-Document is an interim point build of the component. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: The conversion of ouput modules that write and convert the model to files in specific formats is still on-going. Bug fixes and enhancements are detailed in model-ontology section.

release.description: This release of the Model DM-Document is a component of the integrated release 8.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.

release.description: This release of the Model DM-Document is a component of the integrated release 8.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Namespace info is now configurable through the "config.property" file. The conversion of ouput modules that write and convert the model to files in specific formats is still on-going. Bug fixes and enhancements are detailed in model-ontology section.

release.description: This release of the Model DM-Document is a component of the integrated release 7.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: This release of the IMTool includes many changes from the on-going effort to convert internal object model from Protege-based to OWL-based. The conversion of most core routines that manage the object model is mostly completed. The conversion of output modules that write and convert the model to files in specific formats is still on-giong.

release.description: This release of the Model DM-Document represents a point build of this component.
release.action: Updated to allow LDDTool to be relocated - SBN node request 12/7/16.

release.description: This release of the Model DM-Document is a component of the integrated release 7.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
